name: smirked

past simple and past participle of
smirk
to smile in a way that expresses satisfaction or pleasure about having done something, or knowing something that is not known by someone else: I don't like the way he winks and smirks at me whenever he sees me. He smirked his way through the interview. Compare
simper verb
